Name: Astronarch
About the game: A fusion of roguelikes and auto-battlers like never before seen. Recruit a party of mysterious heroes, navigate deadly lands, collect an arsenal of magical items, and vanquish a new evil threatening the realm! Features Party-Based Strategy : Select from a pool of unique heroes, each with skills which inspire vastly different strategies and customization. Position your heroes on the battlefield to influence the outcome of battle. Explore Dynamic Terrain : Each playthrough provides a new journey, changing not only your path, but the bosses you must conquer. Freely move between 3 subareas in each act, rewarding those with the knowledge of where their party can flourish, and where it will falter. Loot! : Collect ancient and magical items which augment your party's stats and abilities. Should your Wildmage be a glass cannon, or a front line bruiser? The decision is yours. Prestige! : After your first victory, heroes will begin growing a cosmetic aura as they conquer the 20 additional Corruption modifiers. Astronarch comes with: 21 Unique and mysterious heroes to unlock. 130+ Mystical items for your arsenal. 100+ Combat encounters, including 11 elite enemies and 12 bosses. 30+ Intriguing map events to be discovered. 3 Acts containing 3 subareas, each with different enemies and terrain. 20 Devious corruption levels to conquer following your first victory.
Meta Title: Astronarch: Jan 22, 2021, Dale Turner and Full Overview
